practice_phrases: She is a woman.
她是女人。
I think she is unfriendly.
我觉得她是不友好。
She is sitting over there.
她是坐在那边。
He said she is a young woman.
他说她是年轻女人。
She is a friend who speaks Chinese.
她是说中文的朋友。
I think she is that young woman over there.
我觉得她是那边那个年轻女人。
She is that young woman who's talking to your friend.
她是正在和你朋友说话的那个年轻女人。
She said she is a woman who doesn't want to work.
她说她是不想工作的女人。
I think she is that young woman who's sitting over there.
我觉得她是坐在那边的那个年轻女人。
She is a young woman who doesn't want to live in a city.
她是不想住在城市里的年轻女人。
My mother wants to pay.
我妈妈想付。
She is my mother.
她是我妈妈。
I think my mother doesn't want to work.
我觉得我妈妈不想工作。
He said my mother wants to sit down.
他说我妈妈想坐下。
My mother doesn't want to seem unfriendly.
我妈妈不想显得不友好。
She said my mother doesn't want to live in a city.
她说我妈妈不想住在城市里。
My mother is that young woman who's sitting over there.
我妈妈是坐在那边的那个年轻女人。
I think my mother doesn't want to work from home.
我觉得我妈妈不想在家工作。
He said my mother wants to show you something.
他说我妈妈想给你看点东西。
She is my mother who's talking to your friend over there.
她是在那边和你朋友说话的我妈妈。
My mother's friend wants to pay.
我妈妈的朋友想付。
She is my mother's friend.
她是我妈妈的朋友。
I think my mother's friend doesn't want to work.
我觉得我妈妈的朋友不想工作。
He said my mother's friend wants to sit down.
他说我妈妈的朋友想坐下。
My mother's friend doesn't want to seem unfriendly.
我妈妈的朋友不想显得不友好。
She said my mother's friend doesn't want to live in a city.
她说我妈妈的朋友不想住在城市里。
My mother's friend is that young woman who's sitting over there.
我妈妈的朋友是坐在那边的那个年轻女人。
I think my mother's friend doesn't want to work from home.
我觉得我妈妈的朋友不想在家工作。
He said my mother's friend wants to show you something.
他说我妈妈的朋友想给你看点东西。
She is my mother's friend who's talking to your friend over there.
她是在那边和你朋友说话的我妈妈的朋友。

lego: my mother's friend / a friend of my mother

我妈妈的朋友想付。
